alert.note: Alert for Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:28PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM MDT... At 528 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Ellsworth Air Force Base, or 7 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ellsworth Air Force Base and northern Box Elder around 535 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
